rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment provides factual description of scale/outcome ('47.7 million birds have been culled', 'many more thousands... have died') using neutral verbs.
The verb 'have been culled' is containment. 'have died' is an outcome verb.
No loaded rhetorical question is present in the text.
The segment reports impact/statistic but does not contain explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Reports factual data (culling numbers) which is a response measure.
